name: Deluxe Cottage
shortDescription: Spacious cottage with stunning mountain views, perfect for families seeking comfort and tranquility.
fullDescription: Our Deluxe Cottage offers the perfect blend of rustic charm and modern comfort. Nestled among towering oak trees, this 800 sq ft retreat features a king-size bed, full kitchen, and a private deck overlooking our organic vegetable gardens. Wake up to the sounds of chirping birds and enjoy your morning coffee while watching the sunrise over the mountains. The cottage includes a cozy living area with a fireplace, perfect for cool evenings, and large windows that flood the space with natural light.

seo.title: Deluxe Cottage - Kerling Farm Accommodation
seo.description: Book our spacious Deluxe Cottage with mountain views, full kitchen, and modern amenities. Perfect for families and couples seeking a peaceful farm-stay experience.

name: Cozy Cabin
shortDescription: Intimate cabin retreat ideal for couples, featuring a romantic setting surrounded by nature.
fullDescription: Experience the ultimate romantic getaway in our Cozy Cabin. This charming 400 sq ft hideaway is designed for couples seeking privacy and connection with nature. The cabin features a comfortable queen bed, a compact kitchenette, and a lovely porch with rocking chairs perfect for stargazing. Despite its cozy size, the cabin includes all modern amenities while maintaining its rustic appeal. The interior showcases reclaimed wood walls, vintage decor, and thoughtful touches that create a warm, inviting atmosphere.

seo.title: Cozy Cabin - Romantic Farm Stay | Kerling Farm
seo.description: Escape to our intimate Cozy Cabin, perfect for couples. Features a queen bed, kitchenette, and peaceful garden views. Book your romantic farm getaway today.

name: Family Suite
shortDescription: Extra spacious suite with separate bedrooms, ideal for larger families or groups.
fullDescription: Our Family Suite is the ultimate choice for larger groups and families who want space without sacrificing togetherness. This expansive 1,200 sq ft accommodation features two separate bedrooms (one with a king bed, one with two twins), a full bathroom, and a generous living area. The fully-equipped kitchen allows for home-cooked meals using fresh produce from our farm stand. Children will love the nearby playground, while adults can relax on the large wraparound porch. With plenty of room for everyone, the Family Suite ensures both privacy and quality family time.

seo.title: Family Suite - Large Group Accommodation | Kerling Farm
seo.description: Spacious Family Suite sleeps 6 with 2 bedrooms, full kitchen, and wraparound porch. Perfect for family vacations and group getaways at our farm.

name: Rustic Barn Loft
shortDescription: Unique barn conversion with exposed beams and authentic farm character.
fullDescription: Step into agricultural history with our Rustic Barn Loft, a stunning conversion that preserves the character of our 100-year-old barn while providing modern comfort. The 600 sq ft loft features soaring ceilings with original exposed beams, large windows that offer pastoral views, and an open floor plan that showcases the building's heritage. The queen bed sits beneath the original hayloft opening (now glassed in), creating a truly unique sleeping experience. This accommodation is perfect for those who appreciate authenticity and want to feel deeply connected to farm life.

seo.title: Rustic Barn Loft - Unique Farm Accommodation | Kerling Farm
seo.description: Stay in our converted 100-year-old Barn Loft with exposed beams and authentic farm character. A truly unique farm-stay experience.
